definition: erhua variant of 女孩[nu:3 hai2]
variant of 人[ren2]/"person" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 10), occurring in 兒, 兀, 兄 etc

sentences.english: Miss Liu is talking with some girl in your classroom.
sentences.chinese: 刘老师正在你们班和某个女孩儿谈话。

sentences.english: Good girls tend to be homebodies.
sentences.chinese: 好女孩儿通常有很强的家庭观念。

sentences.english: The oval frames work best on gals with strong jaw or a square face.
sentences.chinese: 椭圆形镜架最适合下巴线条硬朗或是方脸的女孩儿。

sentences.english: She was a clever child, and the other girls loved to listen to her.
sentences.chinese: 她脑瓜儿很聪明，别的女孩儿都爱听她讲故事。

sentences.english: The little girl saw her birthday presents and broke into a smile.
sentences.chinese: 这个小女孩儿看到生日礼物破颜笑了。

sentences.english: Blown girl hair short skirt, Xiao Ling Tong shoes thin clothing.
sentences.chinese: 吹得女孩儿发长裙短，小龄童衣单鞋薄。

sentences.english: As a student in London, I shared a flat with a Moslem girl.
sentences.chinese: 在伦敦读书的时候，我跟一个穆斯林的女孩儿一起住。

sentences.english: Under the hot lights, my bad girl side really came out.
sentences.chinese: 在热情的灯光下，坏女孩儿的一面充分地展露出来了。

sentences.english: Yiyi is a very beautiful girl.
sentences.chinese: 依依是一个非常漂亮的女孩儿。

sentences.english: The girl lost weight and she was so happy.
sentences.chinese: 这个女孩儿变瘦了，她非常高兴。

sentences.english: With hours of smudge-proof, just-picked perfection, you'll be the prettiest bloom in the bunch!
sentences.chinese: 染上这令人愉悦的深粉色，你就是最美的花样女孩儿。

sentences.english: Ugly guys don't get the girl, even if they're devoted and awesome.
sentences.chinese: 即使丑男又真心又牛屄，他们也搞不上女孩儿。

definition: erhua variant of 男孩[nan2 hai2]
mythological daughter of Fiery Emperor 炎帝[Yan2 di4] who turned into bird Jingwei 精衛|精卫[Jing1 wei4] after drowning
girl/servant girl/(used deprecatingly, but sometimes also as a term of endearment)
(of a person's manner or character) gentle and quiet
